But I definitely don't think there will be any major changes in strategy. Eric Schmidt , 55, said, "We worked as a triumvirate for 10 years." In Tripoli, the veil of nonchalance did slip when the autocratic Muammar al-Qaddafi revealed his" pain" on hearing that Zine El Abidine Ben Ali had fled. There is none better than[ Zine El Abidine Ben Ali ] to govern Tunisia- Tunisians now live in fear, the Libyan leader said on state TV. joked that only his suicide would convince Mike Pence Will Not Run for President Indiana announced Thursday that he would not be a Republican candidate for president in 2012, but he left the door open to running for governor. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mr. Mike Pence wrote in a letter to supporters. captain in the hit show, has revealed that Sue is in fact inspired by Simon Cowell . According to ShowbizSpy, Jane Lynch believes that there are a lot of similarities between the media mogul and Sue... If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her... He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue, there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her.
